info.title: LFX V2 - Survey Service
info.description: Proxy service for ITX survey system

post.description:
Create a scheduled survey for ITX project committees (proxies to ITX POST /surveys/schedule)

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `manage:projects`
  * `manage:surveys`

Create a survey or global exclusion (proxies to ITX POST /v2/surveys/exclusion)

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `manage:projects`
  * `manage:surveys`

delete.description:
Delete a survey or global exclusion (proxies to ITX DELETE /v2/surveys/exclusion)

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `manage:projects`
  * `manage:surveys`

get.description:
Get exclusion by ID (proxies to ITX GET /v2/surveys/exclusion/{exclusion_id})

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `manage:projects`
  * `manage:surveys`

delete.description:
Delete exclusion by ID (proxies to ITX DELETE /v2/surveys/exclusion/{exclusion_id})

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `manage:projects`
  * `manage:surveys`

post.description:
Validate email template body and subject (proxies to ITX POST /v2/surveys/validate_email)

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `manage:projects`
  * `manage:surveys`

get.description:
Get survey details (proxies to ITX GET /v2/surveys/{survey_id})

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `manage:projects`
  * `manage:surveys`

put.description:
Update survey (proxies to ITX PUT /v2/surveys/{survey_id}). Only allowed when status is 'disabled'

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `manage:projects`
  * `manage:surveys`

delete.description:
Delete survey (proxies to ITX DELETE /v2/surveys/{survey_id}). Only allowed when status is 'disabled'

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `manage:projects`
  * `manage:surveys`

post.description:
Bulk resend survey emails to select recipients (proxies to ITX POST /v2/surveys/{survey_id}/bulk_resend)

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `manage:projects`
  * `manage:surveys`

get.description:
Preview which recipients, committees, and projects would be affected by a resend (proxies to ITX GET /v2/surveys/{survey_id}/preview_send)

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `manage:projects`
  * `manage:surveys`

parameters.name: committee_id
parameters.description: Optional committee ID to filter preview

delete.description:
Remove a recipient group (committee, project, or foundation) from survey and recalculate statistics (proxies to ITX DELETE /v2/surveys/{survey_id}/recipient_group)

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `manage:projects`
  * `manage:surveys`

parameters.name: committee_id
parameters.description: Committee ID to remove (indicates specific committee in project)

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID to remove (all removals are attached to a project)

parameters.name: foundation_id
parameters.description: Foundation ID (indicates project_id references a foundation and all subprojects should be removed)

delete.description:
Delete survey response - removes recipient from survey and recalculates statistics (proxies to ITX DELETE /v2/surveys/{survey_id}/responses/{response_id})

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `manage:projects`
  * `manage:surveys`

post.description:
Resend survey email to a specific user (proxies to ITX POST /v2/surveys/{survey_id}/responses/{response_id}/resend)

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `manage:projects`
  * `manage:surveys`

Send survey emails to committee members who haven't received it (proxies to ITX POST /v2/surveys/{survey_id}/send_missing_recipients)

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `manage:projects`
  * `manage:surveys`

parameters.name: committee_id
parameters.description: Optional committee ID to resync only that committee

jwt_header_Authorization.description:
Heimdall JWT authorization

**Security Scopes**:
  * `read:projects`: Read project data
  * `manage:projects`: Manage projects
  * `manage:surveys`: Manage surveys
jwt_header_Authorization.name: Authorization
